name: b22l-skodaji1-ktpw2-semestral-project
description: Package which contains my semestral project done for subject 'Technologies for Web Publishing II' at Faculty of Informatics and Management, University of Hradec Králové.

scripts.build: npx rimraf ./dist && npx tsc --build && npx copyfiles -f ./src/public/styles/*.* ./dist/public/styles/ && npx copyfiles -f ./src/public/images/*.* ./dist/public/images/ && npx copyfiles -f ./src/public/icons/*.* ./dist/public/icons/ && npx copyfiles -f ./src/view/*.* ./dist/view/
scripts.prod: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.debug: npm run build && npm run startdebug

author: Jiri Skoda <skodaji1@uhk.cz>
